strongs_def: probably itself from the base of G5056 (τολμάω) through the idea of extreme conduct); to venture (objectively or in act; while G2292 (τολμάω) is rather subjective or in feeling); by implication, to be courageous
outline:
1. not to dread or shun through fear
  2. to bear, endure
  3. to bring one's self to
  4. to be bold
  5. bear one's self boldly, deal boldly
